lead_paragraph: Kansas City Royals infield prospect Raul Mondesi was suspended for 50 games following a positive test for Clenbuterol, negotiating a 30-game reduction from the usual penalty for a banned steroid after providing evidence he ingested the drug in an over-the-counter medication.

headline.print_headline: MLB Suspends Royals Prospect Mondesi for 50 Games for PED
headline.main: MLB Suspends Royals Prospect Mondesi for 50 Games for PED
